CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​ImageFile
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​File
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​ImageFile

A class containing information about an image file.

Functions
ImageFile
public ImageFile (
Path newFileName,
DateTime newLastModified
)

Creates a new ImageFile with unknown dimensions.

ImageFile
public ImageFile (
Path newFileName,
DateTime newLastModified,
uint width,
uint height
)

Creates a new ImageFile with known dimensions.

Properties
DimensionsKnown
public bool DimensionsKnown { get }

Whether the image's dimensions are known.

Width
public uint Width { get; set }

The image's width.  Check DimensionsKnown before reading.  In debug builds attempting to read while DimensionsKnown is false will throw an exception.

Height
public uint Height { get; set }

The image's height.  Check DimensionsKnown before reading.  In debug builds attempting to read while DimensionsKnown is false will throw an exception.

Variables
width
protected uint width

The width of the image, or zero if unknown.

height
protected uint height

The height of the image, or zero if unknown.
